document_data.mainbody:
Saerol Danonbryl was a member of the Zhentarim in Mulmaster.
In 1491 DR, Saerol was ordered by his master to kill the Lantanese duelist Audrec SeTourne, who was extorting a noble of the city who was allied with the Zhentarim, during one of the gladiator matches in the Black Blade and Bloody Boar tavern.
